trans-unit.source: Represents a property stored in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> 中儲存的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> represents properties in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> such as the (x, y) coordinates, pressure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>代表屬性中的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>例如 （x，y） 座標、 不足的壓力，等等。

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> class to customize the information stored for each property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>類別來自訂每一個屬性儲存的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Presentation Framework ships with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> and specifies the minimum and maximum values, resolution, and unit used for each property.
trans-unit.target: Windows Presentation Framework 隨附<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>並指定最小和最大值、 解決方式，以及用於每個屬性的單位。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>物件從<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>並取得每個資訊<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> class, copying the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 透過複製指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，會唯一地識別 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the property represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指出屬性表示手寫筆上的按鈕則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> class using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 GUID 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>從<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>並取得每個資訊<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> represents a button on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 是否表示手寫筆上的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty" /> 表示手寫筆上的按鈕則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> object from a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>物件從<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>並取得每個資訊<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。
